resources.string:
Version 7.22 (17 September 2017)

\u2022 Add number totals to filters

Version 7.21 (17 September 2017)

\u2022 Add filters to the Main List View

Version 7.20 (03 September 2017)

\u2022 Bug Fixes

Version 7.19 (02 September 2017)

\u2022 Tweaking the images in the list view to render faster

Version 7.18 (30 August 2017)

\u2022 Various UI improvements

Version 7.17 (28 August 2017)

\u2022 Show searching spinner on view page when open

Version 7.16 (20 August 2017)

\u2022 Various fixes on View screen

Version 7.15 (19 August 2017)

\u2022 Remove Done button from View Screen \u2022 Bug Fixes

Version 7.14 (19 August 2017)

\u2022 Swipe to mark Swrls as Done

Version 7.13 (30 July 2017)

\u2022 Visual updates

Version 7.12 (29 May 2017)

\u2022 Improved View Screen for details

Version 7.11 (29 May 2017)

\u2022 Get full details of the Swrls

Version 7.10 (21 May 2017)

\u2022 Cosmetic changes

Version 7.9 (21 May 2017)

\u2022 View screen shows search results if your Swrl has no details

Version 7.8 (21 May 2017)

\u2022 Can click on a search result to see more details before adding it.

Version 7.7 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 First attempt at the View Screen. Click on a Row to see it.

Version 7.6 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Fix for image resizing

Version 7.5 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Images are cached for faster processing

Version 7.4 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Can now search for board games

Version 7.3 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Added ellipses on title and added missing icons

Version 7.2 (14 May 2017)

\u2022 Cleaned up the images on the rows

Version 7.1 (13 May 2017)

\u2022 Search works and now it has images!

Version 7.0 (12 May 2017)

\u2022 Changed the way you add Swrls to a new screen

Version 6.3 (19 February 2017)

\u2022 Can choose a type when pressing enter

Version 6.2 (31 December 2016)

\u2022 Fix Bug when undoing Swrls marked as Done

Version 6.1 (29 December 2016)

\u2022 Swrls can now be added as a Type
\u2022 Can undo marking swrls as done

Version 6 (27 December 2016)

\u2022 First iteration of the Full Screen view of a Swrl listing
